Groups.Name: Main
Groups.DisplayName: The Real Sonic Unleashed Experience Mod - Settings

Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: This system determines which voices will be used within the game.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Adds Sonic Unleashed aura effect to Sonic + Drift boost in certain stages

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Replaces Normal And Super Sonic with their unleashed models, jump balls, and sonics run animation with a edited version of the SCU run animations (since the unleashed one's don't work properly on SCU's skeleton).

Elements.Name: IncludeDir3
Description: Play as Super Sonic, but with the song Super Sonic vs. Perfect Dark Gaia + Unleashed Results.
This option disables the voice system inserted in this mod, returning Roger Craig Smith's original voice made for Sonic Colors: Ultimate.
Use the English voice made for Sonic Unleashed (Jason Griffith).
Use the Japanese voice made for Sonic Unleashed (Jun'ichi Kanemaru).
Disables the Unleashed style Boost aura restoring to the original Sonic Colors Ultimate boost.
Disables Unleashed Sonic Model returning to original Sonic Colors: Ultimate Skeleton.
Disable Super Sonic Music (Super Sonic vs. Perfect Dark Gaia) + Unleashed Results Music.
Enable Super Sonic Music (Super Sonic vs. Perfect Dark Gaia) + Unleashed Results Music.
